{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3281267,"name":"Navarun Jagatpal","username":"nav.jagatpal","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/n/ecccb3/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-01-11T21:21:48.319Z","cooked":"

I‚Äôm having trouble installing WPILib 2024 on my computer. It‚Äôs a Windows machine. I downloaded the iso, then extracted the iso to a folder using 7-zip. When I do that, it extracts, but I get the warning ‚ÄúThere are some data after the end of the payload data.‚Äù

Then I ran WPILibInstaller.exe, and at first everything seems normal. I clicked on ‚ÄúInstall for this user.‚Äù Then I clicked on ‚ÄúDownload for this computer only.‚Äù That part is fine. After some time, the ‚ÄúNext‚Äù button appears, and I click it. Then it appears to be installing, and the progress bar loads, but after a few minutes, the installer just closes itself.

Does anyone have any insight into this problem. I‚Äôve tried this multiple times, and I just haven‚Äôt gotten it to work. My teammates were able to install WPILib on their computers.

Navarun Jagatpal

I did that. That was actually the first thing I tried, double-clicking the iso. And then when I do that, it appears mounted. It appears as a virtual drive, DVD Drive (D:). Then, if I run the installer, the same thing happens. The installer closes itself in the middle of the installation process.

So, yes, that was the first thing I tried, and it failed, and then I tried extracting it using 7-zip, and that also failed.

Yes. I‚Äôve downloaded it twice now, and I‚Äôm getting the same result. Just to be clear, I‚Äôm technically not downloading an installer (.exe), I‚Äôm downloading a disc image (.iso). And then when I mount or extract the iso, it has the installer (.exe) inside it. I‚Äôm downloading the .iso from here:

GitHub

Releases ¬∑ wpilibsuite/allwpilib

Official Repository of WPILibJ and WPILibC. Contribute to wpilibsuite/allwpilib development by creating an account on GitHub.

Also, can you try extracting with the built in windows zip extractor. That data after the end of the payload data error is very weird.

Have you been running the installer exe as administrator?

","post_number":8,"post_type":1,"posts_count":19,"updated_at":"2024-01-12T17:26:30.442Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":101,"readers_count":100,"score":20.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":449517,"topic_slug":"problems-installing-wpilib-2024","display_username":"","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":34950,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/problems-installing-wpilib-2024/449517/8","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3282290,"name":"Navarun Jagatpal","username":"nav.jagatpal","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/n/ecccb3/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-01-12T18:39:52.654Z","cooked":"

OK, I tried extracting with WinZip, and I tried extracting with the built-in extractor, and I still had the same problem.

Then, I tried running the exe as an administrator, and that caused a different problem. The installer appeared to complete, and it gave me the message ‚ÄúFinished installing! Press finish to exit.‚Äù So then I clicked Finish, and then I looked at my desktop, and there was no WPILib 2024 shortcut on my desktop. Additionally, I tried clicking on my start menu after the installation finished and searching for wpilib, but only the wpilib 2023 appeared there.

I recorded a screen capture video of myself attempting to install WPILib 2024, and I uploaded it to YouTube. Here it is:

Hopefully you all can take a look at the video, and maybe that will help you determine what‚Äôs going wrong. If I go to 1:08 in the video, and pause, I am seeing an error. A second window pops up, and I‚Äôm seeing ‚Äújava.io.FileNotFoundException‚Äù. Could that be causing the problem?

","post_number":9,"post_type":1,"posts_count":19,"updated_at":"2024-01-12T18:39:52.654Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":94,"readers_count":93,"score":23.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":449517,"topic_slug":"problems-installing-wpilib-2024","display_username":"Navarun Jagatpal","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2NTiA0MCUIs","internal":false,"reflection":false,"clicks":0}],"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":62951,"hidden":false,"trust_level":0,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/problems-installing-wpilib-2024/449517/9","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3282305,"name":"Peter Johnson","username":"Peter_Johnson","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/peter_johnson/{size}/10417_2.png","created_at":"2024-01-12T18:44:34.071Z","cooked":"

Those error messages say ‚Äúaccess is denied‚Äù. Do you have access to C:\Users\Public\wpilib\2024?

","post_number":10,"post_type":1,"posts_count":19,"updated_at":"2024-01-12T18:44:34.071Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":9,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":80,"readers_count":79,"score":21.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":449517,"topic_slug":"problems-installing-wpilib-2024","display_username":"Peter Johnson","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":62951,"username":"nav.jagatpal","name":"Navarun Jagatpal","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/n/ecccb3/{size}.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":13575,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Volunteer WPILib Developer, CSA"},"post_url":"/t/problems-installing-wpilib-2024/449517/10","custom_user_title":"Volunteer WPILib Developer, CSA","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3282336,"name":"tkchan","username":"tkchan","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/t/ee59a6/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-01-12T19:02:20.090Z","cooked":"

A couple things to check:

  1. Are you running the install inside a Virtual Machine.
  2. Your account that is currently log in to the machine has full Admin rights.
  3. You are NOT using OneDrive‚Äôs ‚Äúbackup‚Äù or possibly Google-Drive-similar or some other software which ‚Äòtakes‚Äô over and remap your ‚Äòuser‚Äô into a ‚Äòlocal‚Äô version of the cloud drive. [you can actually still install everything, but just need to do things manually I believe].
    3a. Is this machine a Networked (as in a Domain) and having the user profile mapped to a network drive.
  4. If not any of the above, try to install ‚ÄòFor You‚Äô only and see if you still run into the same issue.
","post_number":11,"post_type":1,"posts_count":19,"updated_at":"2024-01-12T19:02:20.090Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":3,"reads":75,"readers_count":74,"score":45.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":449517,"topic_slug":"problems-installing-wpilib-2024","display_username":"tkchan","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":26389,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"think outside of the box from time to time"},"post_url":"/t/problems-installing-wpilib-2024/449517/11","custom_user_title":"think outside of the box from time to time","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3282635,"name":"Carolyn","username":"caro","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/c/b19c9b/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-01-12T23:14:39.213Z","cooked":"

Hello @nav.jagatpal!
Thank you for the very detailed description & video of your issue.
Try removing the 2023 WPILIB first.

","post_number":12,"post_type":1,"posts_count":19,"updated_at":"2024-01-12T23:14:39.213Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":72,"readers_count":71,"score":19.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":449517,"topic_slug":"problems-installing-wpilib-2024","display_username":"Carolyn","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":50407,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/problems-installing-wpilib-2024/449517/12","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3287235,"name":"Navarun Jagatpal","username":"nav.jagatpal","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/n/ecccb3/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-01-17T21:30:20.607Z","cooked":"

OK, I uninstalled WPILIB 2023, and ran the WPILIB 2024 installer again. That didn‚Äôt solve the problem.

There was no folder called C:\Users\Public\wpilib\2024. I did have C:\Users\Public\wpilib, and i created a 2024 sub-folder inside it. When I right-click that and click ‚ÄúProperties,‚Äù I see that the Read-only checkbox is checked. See the screenshot.

screenshot -- 2024 -- read only573√ó767 23 KB

If I uncheck the Read-only box, that doesn‚Äôt solve the problem. If I uncheck, and then click ‚ÄúOK‚Äù to close the Properties window, and then right-click and select properties again, the Read-only checkbox is selected again. Somehow this folder is stuck on ‚ÄúRead-only.‚Äù
